component.name: LoadingIndicator
component.script:
Sub init() m.spinner = m.top.findNode("spinner") m.spinner.poster.uri = "pkg:/images/loader.gif" m.spinner.poster.width = "75" m.spinner.poster.height = "75" m.spinner.visible = "true" m.spinner.control = "start"
centerSpinner() End Sub
Sub centerSpinner() 'Center the Spinner spinnerRect = m.spinner.boundingRect() centerx = (1280 - spinnerRect.width) / 2 centery = (720 - spinnerRect.height) / 2
m.spinner.translation = [ centerx, centery-20 ] End Sub
